00040         public function process() {
00041                 F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage('using_controller','F3_MailformPlusPlus_Controller_Multistep');
00042                 session_start();
00043                 
00044                 //read global settings
00045                 $settings = $this->getSettings();
00046 
00047                 // Validate the configuration, throw a possible exception
00048                 $this->validateConfig($settings);
00049 
00050                 //set GET/POST parameters
00051                 $this->gp = array_merge(t3lib_div::_GET(), t3lib_div::_POST());
00052                 if($settings['formValuesPrefix']) {
00053                         $this->gp = $this->gp[$settings['formValuesPrefix']];
00054                         $_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['formValuesPrefix'] = $settings['formValuesPrefix'];
00055                 }
00056                 
00057                 //set submitted
00058                 $submitted = $this->gp['submitted'];
00059                 
00060                 
00061 
00062                 $this->mergeGPWithSession();
00063 
00064                 //set debug mode
00065                 $this->debugMode = ($settings['debug'] == '1')?TRUE:FALSE;
00066                 $_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['debugMode'] = $this->debugMode;
00067 
00068                 //find current step
00069                 $this->findCurrentStep();
00070 
00071                 //set last step
00072                 $this->lastStep = $_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['currentStep'];
00073                 if(!$this->lastStep) {
00074                         $this->lastStep = 1;
00075                 }
00076 
00077                 //find total step count
00078                 $stepCount = 0;
00079                 foreach($settings as $step=>$options) {
00080                         if(is_numeric($step)) {
00081                                 $stepCount ++;
00082                         }
00083                 }
00084                 $this->totalSteps = $stepCount;
00085 
00086                 //merge settings with specific settings for current step
00087                 if(isset($settings[$this->currentStep.'.']) && is_array($settings[$this->currentStep.'.'])) {
00088                         $settings = array_merge($settings,$settings[$this->currentStep.'.']);
00089                 }
00090 
00091                 //set debug mode again. Maybe it is turned off for this step
00092                 $this->debugMode = ($settings['debug'] == '1')?TRUE:FALSE;
00093                 $_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['debugMode'] = $this->debugMode;
00094 
00095                 //store step values in session
00096                 $_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['settings'] = $settings;
00097                 $_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['currentStep'] = $this->currentStep;
00098                 $_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['lastStep'] = $this->lastStep;
00099                 $_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['totalSteps'] = $this->totalSteps;
00100 
00101                 $disableErrorChecks = false;
00102                 if($this->currentStep == $this->lastStep) {
00103                         $disableErrorChecks = true;
00104                 }
00105 
00106                 //add some JavaScript for fancy form stuff
00107                 $this->addSpecialJS($settings);
00108 
00109                 
00110 
00111                 //read template file
00112                 $this->readTemplateFile($settings);
00113 
00114                 // set stylesheet file
00115                 $this->setStyleSheet($settings);
00116 
00117                 //init view
00118                 $viewClass = $settings['view'];
00119                 if(!$viewClass) {
00120                         $viewClass = 'F3_MailformPlusPlus_View_Multistep';
00121                 }
00122                 
00123                 $viewClass = F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::prepareClassName($viewClass);
00124                 $view = $this->componentManager->getComponent($viewClass);
00125                 $view->setLangFile($this->langFile);
00126                 $this->setViewSubpart($view,$settings,$this->currentStep);
00127 
00128                 if($this->finished) {
00129                         F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage('form_finished');
00130                 }
00131                 F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage('using_view',$viewClass);
00132 
00133                 $errors = array();
00134 
00135                 //if not submitted
00136                 if(!$submitted) {
00137                                 
00138                         //clear session variables
00139                         $this->clearSession();
00140                                 
00141                         $this->gp = array();
00142                                 
00143                         //clear uploaded files in temp folder if configured
00144                         $this->clearTempFiles($settings['files.']['clearTempFilesOlderThanHours']);
00145                                 
00146                         //run preProcessors
00147                         $this->runClasses($settings['preProcessors.']);
00148                                 
00149                         //run init interceptors
00150                         $this->runClasses($settings['initInterceptors.']);
00151                                 
00152                         //debug GET/POST parameters
00153                         if(is_array($this->gp) && $this->debugMode) {
00154                                 F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage('current_gp');
00155                                 F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugArray($this->gp);
00156                         }
00157 
00158                         //display form
00159                         return $view->render($this->gp,$errors);
00160                                 
00161                         //if submitted
00162                 } else {
00163 
00164                         //save settings because they have to be changed for error validation
00165                         $oldSettings = $settings;
00166                                 
00167                         //run init interceptors
00168                         if(!$_SESSION['submitted_ok']) {
00169                                 $this->runClasses($settings['initInterceptors.']);
00170                         }
00171                                 
00172                         //debug GET/POST parameters
00173                         if(isset($this->gp) && is_array($this->gp) && $this->debugMode) {
00174                                 F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage('current_gp');
00175                                 F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugArray($this->gp);
00176                         }
00177                                 
00178                         //load settings from right step for error checks, ...
00179                         if($this->currentStep > $this->lastStep) {
00180                                 $settings = $this->getSettings();
00181                                 if(is_array($settings[($this->currentStep-1).'.'])) {
00182                                         $settings = array_merge($settings,$settings[($this->currentStep-1).'.']);
00183                                 }
00184                                 $_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['settings'] = $settings;
00185                         }
00186                                 
00187                         //run validation
00188                         $valid = array(true);
00189                         if(isset($settings['validators.']) && is_array($settings['validators.'])  && !$_SESSION['submitted_ok']) {
00190                                 foreach($settings['validators.'] as $tsConfig) {
00191                                         $className = F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::prepareClassName($tsConfig['class']);
00192                                         F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage('calling_validator',$className);
00193                                         $validator = $this->componentManager->getComponent($className);
00194 
00195                                         $validator->loadConfig($this->gp,$tsConfig['config.']);
00196                                         $res = $validator->validate($errors);
00197                                         array_push($valid,$res);
00198                                 }
00199                         }
00200                                 
00201                         //set settings back to current step settings because validation is over
00202                         $settings = $oldSettings;
00203                         $_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['settings'] = $settings;
00204                                 
00205                         //if form is valid
00206                         if($this->isValid($valid)) {
00207                                 if(!$_SESSION['submitted_ok']) {
00208                                         $this->processFiles();
00209                                 }
00210 
00211                                 //if no more steps
00212                                 if($this->finished) {
00213                                                 
00214                                         if(!is_array($this->gp)) {
00215                                                 $this->gp = array();
00216                                         }
00217                                                 
00218                                         //run save interceptors
00219                                         if(!$_SESSION['submitted_ok']) {
00220                                                 $this->runClasses($settings['saveInterceptors.']);
00221                                         }
00222                                                 
00223                                         //run loggers
00224                                         if(isset($settings['loggers.']) && is_array($settings['loggers.']) && !$_SESSION['submitted_ok']) {
00225                                                 foreach($settings['loggers.'] as $tsConfig) {
00226                                                         $className = F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::prepareClassName($tsConfig['class']);
00227                                                         F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage('calling_logger',$className);
00228                                                         $logger = $this->componentManager->getComponent($className);
00229                                                         $logger->log($this->gp,$tsConfig['config.']);
00230                                                 }
00231                                         }
00232                                                 
00233                                         //run finishers
00234                                         if(isset($settings['finishers.']) && is_array($settings['finishers.'])) {
00235 
00236                                                 ksort($settings['finishers.']);
00237                                                 
00238                                                 //if storeGP is set include Finisher_storeGP, stores GET / POST in the session
00239                                                 if(!$_SESSION['submitted_ok'] && ($settings['storeGP'] == 1 || F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::pi_getFFvalue($this->cObj->data['pi_flexform'],'store_gp', 'sMISC'))){
00240                                                         $this->addFinisherStoreGP(&$settings);
00241                                                 }
00242 
00243                                                 foreach($settings['finishers.'] as $tsConfig) {
00244                                                         $className = F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::prepareClassName($tsConfig['class']);
00245                                                         $finisher = $this->componentManager->getComponent($className);
00246                                                                 
00247                                                         //check if the form was finished before. This flag is set by the F3_Finisher_Confirmation
00248                                                         if(!$_SESSION['submitted_ok']) {
00249                                                                 
00250                                                                 F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage('calling_finisher',$className);
00251                                                                 $tsConfig['config.']['templateFile'] = $settings['templateFile'];
00252                                                                 $tsConfig['config.']['langFile'] = $settings['langFile'];
00253                                                                 $tsConfig['config.']['formValuesPrefix'] = $settings['formValuesPrefix'];
00254 
00255                                                                 $finisher->loadConfig($this->gp,$tsConfig['config.']);
00256 
00257                                                                 //if the finisher returns HTML (e.g. F3_MailformPlusPlus_Finisher_Confirmation)
00258                                                                 if($tsConfig['config.']['returns']) {
00259 
00260                                                                         return $finisher->process();
00261                                                                 } else {
00262                                                                                 
00263                                                                         $this->gp = $finisher->process();
00264                                                                 }
00265 
00266                                                                 //if the form was finished before, only show the output of the F3_MailformPlusPlus_Finisher_Confirmation
00267                                                         } elseif((is_a($finisher,"F3_MailformPlusPlus_Finisher_Confirmation") || is_subclass_of($finisher,"F3_MailformPlusPlus_Finisher_Confirmation"))) {
00268                                                                 $className = F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::prepareClassName($tsConfig['class']);
00269                                                                 F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage('calling_finisher',$className);
00270                                                                 $finisher = $this->componentManager->getComponent($className);
00271                                                                 $tsConfig['config.']['templateFile'] = $settings['templateFile'];
00272                                                                 $tsConfig['config.']['langFile'] = $settings['langFile'];
00273                                                                 $tsConfig['config.']['formValuesPrefix'] = $settings['formValuesPrefix'];
00274                                                                 $finisher->loadConfig($this->gp,$tsConfig['config.']);
00275                                                                 return $finisher->process();
00276                                                         }
00277                                                 }
00278                                         }
00279 
00280                                         //form is not finished, render next step
00281                                 } else {
00282                                                 
00283                                         //if user clicked "submit"
00284                                         if($this->currentStep >= $this->lastStep) {
00285                                                 F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage('Storing GP in session');
00286                                                 $this->storeGPinSession($settings);
00287                                                 $this->mergeGPWithSession();
00288                                         }
00289                                                 
00290                                         //display form
00291                                         return $view->render($this->gp,$errors);
00292                                 }
00293 
00294                                 //not returned, but finished. What to do?
00295 
00296                                 //if form is not valid
00297                         } else {
00298 
00299                                 //stay on current step
00300                                 if($this->lastStep < $_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['currentStep']) {
00301                                         $_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['currentStep']--;
00302                                 }
00303 
00304                                 //load settings from last step again because an error occurred
00305                                 if($this->currentStep > $this->lastStep) {
00306                                         $settings = $this->getSettings();
00307                                         if(isset($settings[($this->currentStep-1)."."]) && is_array($settings[($this->currentStep-1)."."])) {
00308                                                 $settings = array_merge($settings,$settings[($this->currentStep-1).'.']);
00309                                         }
00310                                         $_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['settings'] = $settings;
00311                                 }
00312 
00313                                 //reset the template because step had probably been decreased
00314                                 $this->setViewSubpart($view,$settings,($this->currentStep-1));
00315 
00316                                 //show form with errors
00317                                 return $view->render($this->gp,$errors);
00318                         }
00319                 }
00320         }
00321 
00328         protected function findCurrentStep() {
00329                 if(isset($this->gp) && is_array($this->gp)) {
00330                         $highest = 0;
00331                         foreach (array_keys($this->gp) as $pname) {
00332 
00333                                 if (strstr($pname,'step-')) {
00334                                         $mpPage = substr($pname,strpos($pname,'step-'),6);
00335                                                 
00336                                         if (strpos($mpPage, '-')) {
00337                                                 $mpPage = substr($mpPage,strrpos ($mpPage, '-')+1);
00338                                         } //if end
00339                                                 
00340                                         if(intVal($mpPage) > $highest) {
00341                                                 $highest = intVal($mpPage);
00342                                         }
00343                                 } // if end
00344                         } // foreach end
00345                         $this->currentStep = $highest;
00346                 }
00347                 if(!$this->currentStep) {
00348                         $this->currentStep = 1;
00349                 }
00350         }
00351

00353 
00363         protected function setViewSubpart(&$view,&$settings,$step) {
00364                 $this->finished = 0;
00365 
00366                 //search for ###TEMPLATE_FORM[step][suffix]###
00367                 if(strstr($this->templateFile,"###TEMPLATE_FORM".$step.$settings['templateSuffix']."###")) {
00368                         F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage('using_subpart','###TEMPLATE_FORM'.$step.$settings['templateSuffix'].'###');
00369                         $view->setTemplate($this->templateFile, 'FORM'.$step.$settings['templateSuffix']);
00370                                 
00371                         //search for ###TEMPLATE_FORM[step]###
00372                 } elseif(strstr($this->templateFile,"###TEMPLATE_FORM".$step."###")) {
00373                         F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage('using_subpart','###TEMPLATE_FORM'.$step.'###');
00374                         $view->setTemplate($this->templateFile, 'FORM'.$step);
00375                                 
00376                         //search for ###TEMPLATE_FORM###
00377                 } elseif(strstr($this->templateFile,"###TEMPLATE_FORM###")) {
00378                         F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage('using_subpart','###TEMPLATE_FORM###');
00379                         $view->setTemplate($this->templateFile, 'FORM');
00380                                 
00381                         //mark form as finished
00382                 } else {
00383                                 
00384                         $this->finished = 1;
00385                 }
00386         }
00387 
00394         protected function mergeGPWithSession() {
00395                 session_start();
00396                 if(!is_array($this->gp)) {
00397                         $this->gp = array();
00398                 }
00399                 if(!is_array($_SESSION['mailformplusplusValues'])) {
00400                         $_SESSION['mailformplusplusValues'] = array();
00401                 }
00402                 
00403                 foreach($_SESSION['mailformplusplusValues'] as $step=>&$params) {
00404                         if(is_array($params)) {
00405                                 unset($params['submitted']);
00406                                 if($step != $this->currentStep) {
00407                                         foreach($params as $key=>$value) {
00408                                                 $this->gp[$key] = $value;
00409                                         }
00410                                 }
00411                         }
00412                 }
00413         }
00414 
00422         protected function storeGPinSession(&$settings) {
00423                 session_start();
00424 
00425                 //merge GET/POST again to get a third version of submitted values.
00426                 //the values in $this->gp are not reliable because they got merged with $_SESSION in initPreProcessor
00427                 $newGP = array_merge(t3lib_div::_GET(), t3lib_div::_POST());
00428                 if($_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['settings']['formValuesPrefix']) {
00429                         $newGP = $newGP[$_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['settings']['formValuesPrefix']];
00430                 }
00431 
00432                 //set the variables in session
00433                 foreach($newGP as $key=>$value) {
00434                         if(!strstr($key,"step-") && !strstr($key,"submitted")) {
00435                                 $_SESSION['mailformplusplusValues'][$this->currentStep-1][$key] = $value;
00436                         }
00437                 }
00438 
00439                 //check for checkbox and radiobutton fields using the values in $newGP
00440                 if($settings['checkBoxFields']) {
00441                         $fields = t3lib_div::trimExplode(",",$settings['checkBoxFields']);
00442                         foreach($fields as $field) {
00443                                 if(!isset($newGP[$field]) && isset($this->gp[$field])) {
00444                                         $_SESSION['mailformplusplusValues'][$this->currentStep-1][$field] = array();
00445                                 }
00446                         }
00447                 }
00448                 if($settings['radioButtonFields']) {
00449                         $fields = t3lib_div::trimExplode(",",$settings['radioButtonFields']);
00450                         foreach($fields as $field) {
00451                                 if(!isset($newGP[$field]) && isset($this->gp[$field])) {
00452                                         $_SESSION['mailformplusplusValues'][$this->currentStep-1][$field] = array();
00453                                 }
00454                         }
00455                 }
00456                 
00457                 
00458         }
